oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Breakfast At The Opry - 1953-04-11 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1953-04-11 broadcast of WSM's Breakfast At The Opry, part 2. Personnel include Dave Overton (announcer), Eddie Hill (host), Ernest Tubb (performer), Billy Bird (performer with the Texas Troubadours), Dickie Harris (performer with the Texas Troubadours), Ray Price (guest), and Marty Robbins (guest). Held at the Noel Hotel, Nashville, TN. Sponsored by Rock City. Names of audience members are unconfirmed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Hill; Ernest Tubb; Texas Troubadours
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Eddie Hill talks to Louise Alderdice [continued from part 1] -- When You Wore A Tulip And I Wore A Big Red Rose (Eddie Hill, audience) -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill to audience member Rosie Forsyth -- Eddie Hill introduces Rosie Forsyth to Marty Robbins -- Dave Overton talks about the program -- Dave Overton introduces audience member Nellie Cato -- Eddie Hill and Nellie Cato talk -- Eddie Hill introduces Nellie Cato to Ray Price -- Letters Have No Arms (Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours) -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill to audience member Sarah Newlin -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill to audience member Elda Lerkey -- Dave Overton announces the competition winner -- Eddie Hill talks to various audience members -- Closing statement (Eddie Hill) -- Closing statement (Dave Overton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Breakfast at the opry (Radio program); Overton, Dave; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Texas Troubadours; Byrd, Billy; Harris, Dickie (Steel guitarist); Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Robbins, Marty
